class_notes: DO NOT TRY TO ENROLL IF YOU DID NOT RECEIVE A SPECIFIC ENROLLMENT WINDOW! Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program. Non-certificate students can try to enroll during Open Enrollment, if there are open seats.
prerequisites: B.A. is a pre-/co-requisite for Contract Drafting. Only Certificate students are allowed to register at this time. All remaining seats will be released during the next open enrollment period.  Please contact Kelli.Pittman@emory.edu with all inquiries.
